data.lyric:
[ti:Screw Juice (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Screw Juice (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:04.78]Lyrics by：Nick Mira/Jarad Higgins
[00:09.57]Composed by：Nick Mira/Jarad Higgins
[00:14.36]I'm apart I'm exposed
[00:20.80]I'm the flaws hell if I know
[00:27.04]I'm the cause the cuts and the deep wounds
[00:33.54]Made it this far
[00:36.17]If I can then you can too
[00:39.32]If I can then you can too
[00:42.45]If I can then you can too woo
[00:45.40]Been a long fight still no truth
[00:48.04]Oh yeah
[00:48.63]Been a long night sippin' on chop and screw juice
[00:51.39]She said she wanna screw Juice
[00:52.99]Her boyfriend like "Screw Juice"
[00:54.77]Hit 'em with the ooh-la-la
[00:56.04]Then hit 'em with the doom-doom
[00:57.94]Everyday my heart racin' Lamborghini s**t on vroom-vroom
[01:00.95]Everyday my heart racin' for no reason what have I come to
[01:05.54]Yeah what have I turned to
[01:07.26]A lot of people turn their back on me what have I turned to
[01:11.35]Man f**k that s**t I gotta stay true
[01:14.30]Sippin' on Actavis in my panic room
[01:18.36]I'm apart I'm exposed
[01:24.74]I'm the flaws hell if I know
[01:31.01]I'm the cause the cuts and the deep wounds
[01:37.61]Made it this far
[01:40.11]If I can then you can too
[01:42.93]D**gs in my hand
[01:44.21]My hand
[01:44.83]What I'm gon' do
[01:45.82]Yeah
[01:46.24]I'm a high guy
[01:47.40]High guy
[01:47.84]Kinda fly too
[01:49.09]Cupid did a drive-by shot me from the sunroof
[01:52.08]Hit a n***a ten times Gucci shirt I bled through
[01:55.77]Stains stains stains stains blood in the rain
[02:02.16]Shame shame shame shame
[02:05.35]He used my chest as a firin' range
[02:08.75]Um fire away
[02:10.68]Fire away
[02:11.31]I'm feeling low so I feel like I'm gon' get higher today
[02:13.75]Higher away ayy
[02:14.96]Click-clack fire away
[02:17.08]Fire away
[02:17.66]Night crawlin' me and Michael Myers on a double date
[02:22.32]I'm apart I'm exposed
[02:28.72]I'm the flaws hell if I know
[02:35.03]I'm the cause the cuts in a deep wound
[02:41.41]Made it this far
[02:44.21]If I can then you can too
data.trans:
[ti:Screw Juice (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.78]//
[00:09.57]//
[00:14.36]我支离破碎 我无处可藏
[00:20.80]如果我知道我惹人厌恶
[00:27.04]我是罪魁祸首 留下难以愈合的伤口
[00:33.54]我已经走了这么远
[00:36.17]如果我可以做到 那你也可以
[00:39.32]如果我可以做到 那你也可以
[00:42.45]如果我可以做到 那你也可以
[00:45.40]这是一场旷日持久的战斗 我依然找不到真相
[00:48.04]//
[00:48.63]长夜漫漫 我肆无忌惮 喝着那种东西
[00:51.39]她说她想品尝一下
[00:52.99]她男朋友对我恨之入骨
[00:54.77]对他们嗤之以鼻
[00:56.04]好好教训他一顿
[00:57.94]每天我的心怦怦直跳 开着兰博基尼 马达轰鸣
[01:00.95]每天我的心都无缘无故地狂跳不止 我走到何种地步
[01:05.54]我还能寻求谁的帮助
[01:07.26]许多人背叛了我 我还能寻求谁的帮助
[01:11.35]哥们 我不屑一顾 我忠于本心
[01:14.30]我在令人毛骨悚然的房间里酣快畅饮
[01:18.36]我支离破碎 我无处可藏
[01:24.74]如果我知道我惹人厌恶
[01:31.01]我是罪魁祸首 留下难以愈合的伤口
[01:37.61]我已经走了这么远
[01:40.11]如果我可以做到 那你也可以
[01:42.93]**在手
[01:44.21]在我手里
[01:44.83]我要做什么
[01:45.82]//
[01:46.24]我兴奋不已
[01:47.40]兴奋不已
[01:47.84]嗨到不能自已
[01:49.09]丘比特驾车扫荡 从天窗上朝我开枪
[01:52.08]朝我开了十枪 鲜血染红我的古驰衬衫
[01:55.77]血迹斑斑 血流如注
[02:02.16]令人感到羞耻
[02:05.35]他把我的胸膛当做活靶子
[02:08.75]疯狂射击
[02:10.68]疯狂射击
[02:11.31]今天我感觉情绪低落 所以我去找点乐子
[02:13.75]嗨到忘乎所以
[02:14.96]子弹上膛 疯狂射击
[02:17.08]疯狂射击
[02:17.66]夜晚纵享欢乐 我和Michael Myers一起参加四人约会
[02:22.32]我支离破碎 我无处可藏
[02:28.72]如果我知道我惹人厌恶
[02:35.03]我是罪魁祸首 造成不可磨灭的伤害
[02:41.41]我已经走了这么远
[02:44.21]如果我可以做到 那你也可以
